definitions.title: scale-like
definitions.body: (appar. redupl. fr. …[[חסף]] for [[חספסף]], v. Ew:§ 158 c Ol:§§ 214, 276 Ges:§ 55, 6 Sta:§ 291; Kö:i, 250 thinks euphon. for [[מְחֻסְפָּף]]; to be comp. are Ar. xa4ifa, have scab, itch (Frey; but 4 = [[ס]] ?); Aram. [[חַסְפָּא]] potsherd, [[חַסְפְּנִיתָא]] scale (of fish), scurf; Eth. xa3afa: scabiosus fuit Di:587 and Ex 16:14)—hence [[מְחֻסְפָּס]] scaled off, scale-like as Syrver Targum Thes RobGes MV SS VB;—of the manna [[דַּק מְחֻסְêָפּס דַּק כַּכְּפׂר]] Ex 16:14 a fine, scale-like thing, fine as the hoar-frost.
